title: HiSET School Breakfast
prompt:
Healthy eating habits are important. Research has shown that children who eat healthy breakfasts learn more effectively. Your local school district is considering implementing a free breakfast program that will provide a nutritious breakfast available to all students before class.

Write an essay for your local newspaper in which you argue that the school district should implement this program. Think carefully about what reasons will convince parents and school board members to implement the program.
feedback: Thank you for your response! We will grade your essay and get you feedback soon.
